ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard: The invisible class
ygData.msgSnippet: That would imply they ever thought about us in the first place. Kit ... From: Katy Westerman [mailto:katyw@cs.ucr.edu] Sent: Saturday, March 18, 2000 9:40 AM
ygData.messageBody:
That would imply they ever thought about us in the first place.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Katy Westerman [mailto:katyw@...]
Sent: Saturday, March 18, 2000 9:40 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard: The invisible class


From: Katy Westerman <katyw@...>


From EQCaster:

I'm putting money on this. I have a bet that they will nerf the Fiery
Avenger soon because it overpowers the Paladin class. If you don't
think they will look what they did to the rangers Mistwalker.
Come on Verant don't let me down I have 5kpp riding on this and you
need to nerf it before December 2000.

--

Not really. You haven't seen the equivalent warrior, shadowknight,
ranger, monk, and rogue weapons.

-Gordon


Doh. Did they forget us again?


--
